main event: A witness reported seeing a lighted, saucer-shaped object near Conway, South Carolina, on February 7, 1953, and fired shots at it to determine what it was.
interesting points: The object was described as being about the size of an apple held at arm's length and silver in color., The object remained stationary for a moment before rapidly taking off without any sound., The witness fired 48 shots from his rifle at the object after it took off., There were other reports of unidentified flying objects in the Conway area around the same time., The witness had been advised by his father to keep quiet about the incident out of fear.
witness description: A 26-year-old ex-serviceman and his mother and brother
